# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

add_library(contrib-libs-libxslt)


target_compile_options(contrib-libs-libxslt PRIVATE
  -DHAVE_CONFIG_H
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)

target_include_directories(contrib-libs-libxslt PUBLIC
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libxslt
)

target_include_directories(contrib-libs-libxslt PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libxslt/libxslt
)

target_link_libraries(contrib-libs-libxslt PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-libxml
)

target_sources(contrib-libs-libxslt PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libxslt/libxslt/attributes.c
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libxslt/libxslt/attrvt.c
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libxslt/libxslt/documents.c
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libxslt/libxslt/extensions.c
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libxslt/libxslt/extra.c
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libxslt/libxslt/functions.c
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libxslt/libxslt/imports.c
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libxslt/libxslt/keys.c
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libxslt/libxslt/namespaces.c
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libxslt/libxslt/numbers.c
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libxslt/libxslt/pattern.c
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libxslt/libxslt/preproc.c
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libxslt/libxslt/security.c
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libxslt/libxslt/templates.c
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libxslt/libxslt/transform.c
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libxslt/libxslt/variables.c
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libxslt/libxslt/xslt.c
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libxslt/libxslt/xsltlocale.c
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libxslt/libxslt/xsltutils.c
)
